title: Mercedes hit by $1.2 billion in tariff costs as full-year earnings more than halve
summary_full: German luxury car manufacturer Mercedes-Benz Group on Thursday reported a steep drop in full-year profit and warned of challenging times ahead.
summary_public: German luxury car manufacturer Mercedes-Benz Group on Thursday reported a steep drop in full-year profit and warned of challenging times ahead.
